Title: Terry Kitties
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Phil Augusta Jackson, Tricia McAlpin, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Terry enlists Jake's help in solving a twenty year old case which his old precinct never let him forget, Charles allows Adrian Pimento to stay at his place and soon regrets it, while Amy, Rosa and Holt attend a class together.
